attributes.title: What a horrid app.
attributes.review: this app is completely disgusting. i downloaded it to see what the hype was about and it took days to download. and then when i opened the app it made me sign up. it then took my identity and sent bombs tp my neighborhood. thank goodness they delivered it to the wrong house. i still tried to use the app but 10000 PICTURES OF TRUMPS NUDES CAME UP! i was utterly disgusted and upset. then the fbi delivered a box of roaches and rats to each house in my neighborhood, so now everyone’s houses are infested with rodents and rats and they are crawling through the streets and in our cars too. my family and i now have to move and i have to go through pounds of therapy to get over this.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is so awful not only is there some big orange stain appearing frequently on screen, but there’s a lot of underlying racism, homophobia, and fascism that must be compensating for something the app is lacking. overall would NOT recommend and if the app store had any moral code it would be deleted :) 🖤💛

attributes.title: PERIOD 💅🏽
attributes.review: It took WEEEKSSSSS for it to even download and after getting the app it will just go off in the middle of the night and alarms would just go off and there is RATS on the app DONT GET IT I REPEAT DONT GET IT also in the app it says that it will take up 999999999999999999999999999999999% of your phone DONT GET THE APP PERIODT 💅🏽

attributes.title: actually terrible.
attributes.review: Poor interface, checked the code and my grandma can create if loops that run better than this.

attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME CALL 911🙀🤬
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app to show my love to my favorite flaming cheeto puff🍊 I was sooooo excited to see this app but when I opened it a picture of a very old ugly orange man with a fake yellow butt wig appeared🙊 I was sooooo terrified and scared like what did this imposter do to my idol; the flaming cheeto puff. Umm anyways chile so I was about to call 911 because I was scared for me and my purple cat’s safety but then I remembered #ACAB so I didn’t🤪Anyways I defff dont recomend u to download this app like it literally took 9 hours for it to load and it overheated my phone🤯🤬only to see the horrible cheeto imposter😱😭 To finish off this review I decided to leave some Kardashian quotes that apply to the creator of this app:
“Just like 20 pounds overweight”
“You’re worthless✨”
“Kim, there’s people that are dying”
“No, I am going to tell you what your issue is”
“Your lucky that I am gracing you with my ideas”
“You are so dumb please dont”

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took 5 days to download and it crashed my phone multiple times. The funny part is I’m not even Mexican. Sorry Mexicans. My mom told me to download it but I told her I will not be voting for trump anytime soon. Then 5 minutes later while I was taking a dump rats started to come out of my charger port. I had to give my phone to animal control. Then I got a notification that my Mexican brother-in-law was gonna get deported so I went 500 miles to trump tower and my bro was there but then I got another notification that my cat was going to send a nuke to my house and I should leave the country. The funny thing was that I live in Antarctica. Pls don’t delete my house I’m hejsbsbs I like oranges better to be honest, (and) I’m surprised that they didn’t try to (patent) transferring data since it’s been 7 years and this finally (exists), but they are saying it’s the best thing since sliced bread. Well, my phone isn’t bread so I’m gonna stay with Android.

attributes.title: Seriously
attributes.review: The thing I want most is to be able to rate an app lower than one star. Absolutely awful. This app gave me AND my family corona virus. Just because we were in the same house and the device downloading it. The app had an option in it to enter my phone number and it WOULD NOT STOP copy and pasting my number onto the DT official Instagram account 🙄 -300009880/10 DONT recommend.

attributes.title: Dissatisfied, app doesn’t work
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get more updates around the campaign, however I was severely disappointed. When I first opened the app it kept crashing and logging me out of the app. So I re downloaded it but it just made everything worse. The app taps into your other apps and changes everything. The other day it logged into my Spotify account and started playing the Sofia the first theme song on repeat. It got so bad my kids and I started getting nightmares. My daughter the other day cried because she thought she was gonna turn into a princess overnight, but her dream is to be a fairy. How do you explain to a little girl that she won’t turn into a princess overnight if she keeps hearing that theme song in her dreams. The app also logged into my amazon account and ordered 1000 orders of the book Trump 101: The way to success. I cancelled the order but they still keep sending me the books every week! It’s frustrating! If I could I would definitely give the app a 0 out of 5 stars. Not worth all the problems I had to go through.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: Very horrible, very terrible.  I know MANY things about apps, more than you would know. This app, I don't like it. It's a bad app. I say we get rid of apps, send it back where it belongs.
